text: Made in U.S.A is a 1966 French crime comedy movie directed by Jean-Luc Godard and was based on the novels The Big Sleep by Raymond Chandler and The Judder by Donald E. Westlake. It stars Anna Karina, Ernest Menzer, László Szabó, Jean-Pierre Léaud, Kyôto Kosaka, Yves Afonso, Jean-Claude Bouillon. ==Other websites== * * Category:1966 comedy movies Category:1966 crime movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French crime movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Jean-Luc Godard
title: Made in U.S.A (1966 movie)
